dict.string: dcm4chee218mysql

SELECT \ '', \ CONCAT( '?EKey=', E.pk, '&cache=_cache_&institution=_institution_&StudyInstanceUID=', E.study_iuid ) ,\ E.study_custom3, \ IF(P.pat_id_issuer != 'NULL', CONCAT( '?PatientID=', P.pat_id, '&issuer=', P.pat_id_issuer, '&cache=_cache_'), CONCAT( '?PatientID=', P.pat_id,'&cache=_cache_') ), \ P.pat_name, \ E.study_datetime, \ E.mods_in_study, \ E.study_desc, \ E.ref_physician, \ E.study_custom2, \ P.pat_id_issuer, \ P.pat_birthdate, \ P.pat_sex, \ E.accession_no, \ EAI.entity_id, \ E.study_id, \ E.study_iuid, \ TIME(E.study_datetime), \ E.study_custom1, \ P.pk, \ E.pk, \ '_institution_', \ '_cache_', \ P.pat_id, \ DATE(E.study_datetime), \ E.num_series, \ E.num_instances, \ EAI.entity_uid, \ EAI.entity_uid_type \
SELECT count(E.*) \
FROM study AS E \ LEFT JOIN patient P ON E.patient_fk=P.pk \ LEFT JOIN issuer EAI ON E.accno_issuer_fk=EAI.pk \ WHERE TRUE
ORDER BY E.pk DESC
AND E.study_iuid REGEXP '%@'

array.string: AND E.accession_no='%@' AND EAI.entity_uid='@%' AND EAI.entity_uid_type='@%'
AND E.accession_no='%@' AND EAI.entity_uid='@%' AND EAI.entity_uid_type='@%' AND EAI.entity_id='@%'

dict.string: %@ "SELECT sop_cuid FROM instance WHERE series_fk='%@' %@" %@
%@ "SELECT sop_iuid FROM instance WHERE series_fk='%@' %@" %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ series_iuid, \ series_desc, \ series_no, \ modality, \ institution, \ department, \ station_name, \ perf_physician, \ laterality, \ num_instances, \ DATE(pps_start), \ TIME(pps_start) \ FROM series \ WHERE study_fk=%@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ 0 \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ 1 \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ HEX(inst_attrs) \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@
AND sop_cuid REGEXP '%@'
AND NOT(sop_cuid REGEXP '%@')
fifthTextUnitHEX2ASCII

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sopiuid, \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.pk='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sopiuid, \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.study_iuid='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sopiuid, \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.accession_no='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ files.filesystem_fk, \ files.filepath \ FROM files \ LEFT JOIN instance ON instance.pk=files.instance_fk WHERE instance.series_fk=%@ \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ P.pk, \ P.pat_id, \ P.pat_name, \ P.pat_id_issuer, \ P.pat_birthdate, \ P.pat_sex \ FROM patient AS P \ WHERE P.pk=%@ %@ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ E.pk, \ E.study_iuid, \ E.study_desc, \ DATE(E.study_datetime), \ TIME(E.study_datetime), \ E.accession_no, \ E.study_id, \ E.ref_physician, \ E.study_custom3, \ E.num_series, \ E.mods_in_study, \ E.study_custom1, \ E.study_custom2, \ E.study_custom3, \ EAI.entity_id, \ EAI.entity_uid, \ EAI.entity_uid_type \ FROM study AS E \ WHERE E.pk=%@ %@ " %@
